alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 9:19AM MDT until June 24 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Avondale...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM MDT Thursday was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.6 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon around 130 PM MDT.
